Two Way Tables

2016-11-17

Two way tables are useful in exploring the relationship between categorical variables. This vignette summarizes the following functions available in the testlib package to create and visualize two way tables:

  • cross_table
  • barplot.cross_table
  • mosaicplot.cross_table

Create a two way table by specifying the two categorical variables, the relationship between which is being explored.

k <- cross_table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$am)
k
##     Cell Contents
##  |---------------|
##  |     Frequency |
##  |       Percent |
##  |       Row Pct |
##  |       Col Pct |
##  |---------------|
## 
##  Total Observations:  32 
## 
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## |              |                     am                     |
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## |          cyl |            0 |            1 |    Row Total |
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## |            4 |            3 |            8 |           11 |
## |              |        0.094 |         0.25 |              |
## |              |         0.27 |         0.73 |         0.34 |
## |              |         0.16 |         0.62 |              |
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## |            6 |            4 |            3 |            7 |
## |              |        0.125 |        0.094 |              |
## |              |         0.57 |         0.43 |         0.22 |
## |              |         0.21 |         0.23 |              |
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## |            8 |           12 |            2 |           14 |
## |              |        0.375 |        0.062 |              |
## |              |         0.86 |         0.14 |         0.44 |
## |              |         0.63 |         0.15 |              |
## -------------------------------------------------------------
## | Column Total |           19 |           13 |           32 |
## |              |        0.594 |        0.406 |              |
## -------------------------------------------------------------

Visualize the two way tables in the following plots:

  • Bar Plot
k <- cross_table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$am)
plot(k)

  • Grouped Bar Plot
k <- cross_table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$am)
plot(k, beside = TRUE)

  • Proportional Bar Plot
k <- cross_table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$am)
plot(k, beside = FALSE, proportional = TRUE)

  • Mosaic Plot
k <- cross_table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$am)
mosaicplot(k)

Developed by Aravind Hebbali.
